description: JSBI is a pure-JavaScript implementation of [the official ECMAScript BigInt proposal](https://tc39.github.io/proposal-bigint/), which is on track to become a part of the JavaScript language in the near future.
name: jsbi

scripts.ci: npm run lint && git status && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && npm test
scripts.generate-benchmarks: for op in add and div mod mul neg not or sar shl sub xor; do scripts/generate-benchmark.py generate "${op}" > "benchmarks/${op}.mjs"; done
scripts.test: node --no-warnings --experimental-modules tests/tests.mjs; set -e; for file in benchmarks/*.mjs; do node --no-warnings --experimental-modules "${file}"; done
